name: Xinrui Cui
content: Xinrui Cui | University of North Texas Xinrui Cui Computer Science and Engineering Assistant Professor Discovery Park F264 Xinrui.Cui@unt.edu About Faculty Info | Website | Education PhD, University of British Columbia, 2020Major: Electrical and Computer Engineering Research Dr. Xinrui Cui's core research interests lie in Computer Vision and Graphics, with the ultimate goal to improve human life through advanced AI systems. Toward this goal, he is especially interested in investigating how to create AI systems to strike the right balance between understanding the local environment and adapting to it while maintaining transparency, controllability, and user trust. ©
